column1: In the The Later Annals of Beleriand and the Grey Annals

column11: p. 240 The Boromir referred to in the The Etymologies (cf. Boromir (Lord of Ladros)#Etymology) is thus Borlach.

column1: Early versions of the name were directly tied to the root BOR-
